snippet: John Miller, a bass player, an actor and an orchestra assembler, lives in Manhattan with his wife, Constance Barron.
abstract: Musician John Miller, who makes most of his living assembling orchestras for Broadway shows, loves two-bedroom Upper West Side apartment he has been renting since 1968; he and his wife, actress and singer Constance Barron, have filled sunny space with musical instruments, including 11 basses and studio piano.
lead_paragraph: John Miller, a bass player, an actor and an orchestra assembler, lives in Manhattan with his wife, Constance Barron.

headline.print_headline: The Apartment Stays in the Picture
headline.main: A Musician on the Upper West Side
